reg_pit.acttitle: Sechelt Indian Government District Enabling Act
reg_pit.title:
Sechelt Indian Government District
Property Taxation Suspension Regulation

change.changenote: Section 2 (c) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 76/2022, effective March 30, 2022.

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: that the District Council shall forthwith, on receiving details from the Minister of Finance and Corporate Relations of the amount outstanding, pay to him an amount equal to the arrears of taxes owing under the Taxation (Rural Area) Act for 1987 and previous taxation years, together with outstanding interest and penalties, by persons who are, at the date this section comes into force, occupiers of Sechelt lands.
